pages.text: The $(mob)Polar Bear$() is a neutral animal found in icy biomes in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It often spawns with one or more cubs, which flee when hit.$(p)Attacking a $(mob)Polar Bear$() or getting too close to one of its cub will cause it to attack the player, mauling it at melee range.$(p)Unlike most other animals, it cannot be bred.
